scripts.test: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bun --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); require('child_process').execSync('bun test', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch (e) { if (e.message.includes('bun')) console.log('Bun not available, skipping bun tests'); else throw e; }"
scripts.test:coverage: node -e "try { require('child_process').execSync('bun --version', {stdio: 'ignore'}); require('child_process').execSync('bun test --coverage', {stdio: 'inherit'}); } catch (e) { if (e.message.includes('bun')) console.log('Bun not available, skipping bun coverage'); else throw e; }"
